review.title: “Nice job to have while at school.”
review.pros: Pros – Pay is fair for what you do, but having to pay for your own gas to go to some of the job locations really sucks.
review.cons: Cons – Sometimes you get students who are too far to compensate for the gas you use unless you have many in the same area. Tutoring can be challenging with difficult students who don't care.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Take the time communicate with your employees so that they stay from school year to school year. Adding a benefits package to tutors who work more constant hours.

review.title: “Company went out of business and told me last minute”
review.pros: Pros – THey find clients for you
review.cons: Cons – Cheapskates when it comes to pay. THey take a big chunk of the fees, and give near half, yet no gas reimbursement
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Reimburse for gas and do mmore marketing.
